message_1: What will be the precipitate formed when solutions of Silver Nitrate (AgNO3) and Sodium Chloride (NaCl) are mixed together? Also, write a balanced chemical equation for the reaction that occurs during the precipitation.
message_2:
When solutions of Silver Nitrate (AgNO3) and Sodium Chloride (NaCl) are mixed together, the precipitate formed is Silver Chloride (AgCl).

The balanced chemical equation for the reaction is:

AgNO3(aq) + NaCl(aq) â†’ AgCl(s) + NaNO3(aq)
